ABOUT.LABEL: About/>
ABOUT.L2: Software engineering student with electrical engineering roots and a product-first mindset.
ABOUT.ROLE: I'm a full-stack engineer and systems designer.
ABOUT.H1_L1: Moved from freelance video to frontend; combine creative work and engineering to deliver dependable results.
ABOUT.H1_L2: Grew and led an Arma 3 community of 150+; built attendance and ranking systems and coordinated events.
ABOUT.H1_L3: Reworked Arma mod loading—reduced total mod load by ~70% and improved client/server load times and runtime performance.
ABOUT.H2_L1: Build large-scale procedural terrain pipelines from OpenStreetMap data and optimize workflows for very large environments.
ABOUT.H2_L2: Built and run armasrbija.rs—combining backend, frontend, and deployment for community and game services.
ABOUT.H2_L3: Open to roles and contracts with clear ownership, pipeline optimization, and measurable impact.
ABOUT.LANGS_INLINE: Languages: C, C++, Python, Java, C#, TypeScript/JavaScript, SQL
ABOUT.TOOLS_INLINE: Tools: Angular, Node.js, Tailwind, Git, Docker, SQLite, Cloudflare, Linux
